sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { View, Text, StyleSheet, TouchableOpacity, TextInput } from 'react-native'
import COLORS from '../../assets/colors/colors'

import { Ionicons } from '@expo/vector-icons';
import { AntDesign } from '@expo/vector-icons';
import { MaterialIcons } from '@expo/vector-icons';

export default function Header() {
    return (
        <View style={styles.container}>
            <View style={styles.screen}>
                <View style={styles.top}>
                    <View>
                        <TouchableOpacity>
                            <Ionicons name="ios-location-outline" size={15} color={COLORS.white} />
                        </TouchableOpacity>
                        <Text>Hi Betrnd</Text>
                        <Text>Welcome To Basement Plus</Text>
                    </View>
                    <TouchableOpacity>
                        <Ionicons name="ios-notifications-outline" size={22} color={COLORS.white} />
                        <View style={styles.counter}>
                            <Text style={{ color: COLORS.white }}>1</Text>
                        </View>
                    </TouchableOpacity>
                </View>
                <View style={styles.searchContainer}>
                    <View style={styles.searchContainerAnnex}>
                        <AntDesign name="search1" size={20} color={COLORS.dark} style={{ marginHorizontal: 20, }} />
                        <TextInput placeholder="Search for a food" style={styles.input} />
                    </View>

                    <View style={styles.sort}>
                        <TouchableOpacity>
                            <MaterialIcons name="sort" size={24} color={COLORS.secondary} />
                        </TouchableOpacity>
                    </View>
                </View>
            </View>
        </View>
    )
}

const styles = StyleSheet.create({
    container: {
        height: '30%',
        width: '100%',
        backgroundColor: COLORS.alternate,
        transform: [{ scaleX: 2.5 }],
        borderBottomStartRadius: 200,
        borderBottomEndRadius: 200,
        overflow: 'hidden',
    },
    screen: {
        marginHorizontal: 15,
        flex: 1,
        transform: [{ scaleX: 0.4 }],
        marginTop: 10
    },
    counter: {
        position: 'absolute',
        width: 12,
        height: 12,
        backgroundColor: COLORS.secondary,
        borderRadius: 50,
        alignItems: 'center',
        justifyContent: 'center',
        right: -2,
        top: 2,

    },
    searchContainer: {
        flexDirection: 'row',
        marginTop: 30,
        alignItems: 'center',
    },
    searchContainerAnnex: {
        flexDirection: 'row',
        alignItems: 'center',
        backgroundColor: COLORS.white,
        height: 40,
        borderRadius: 7,
        width: '83%',
        marginRight: 5
    },
    sort: {
        backgroundColor: COLORS.white,
        height: 40,
        width: '15%',
        borderRadius: 7,
        alignItems: 'center',
        justifyContent: 'center'
    },
    top: {
        flexDirection: 'row',
        justifyContent: 'space-between',
    },
    input: {
        fontSize: 15,
        fontWeight: '600',
        color: COLORS.dark,
        flex: 1,
        height: 40,
    }
})
